name: Grimtaash
Lore: 'Dejarik representation of mythical Molator guardian. The spirit of Grimtaash is said to protect Alderaanian royalty from corruption and betrayal.',
Text: 'USED: If opponent has 13 or more cards in hand, place all but 8 (random selection) in Used Pile.LOST: Cancel Molator (even at a holosite). OR Use 4 Force to reveal opponent''s hand. All cards opponent has two or more of in hand are lost.',
